entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
